profile_positions.description:
Strivesource is an expert in IT and Digital Procurement. We provide consultancy for mid-size to large enterprise customers​, enabling companies to increase value out of their IT supply base and build profitable partnerships. Our services cover IT procurement acquisition & carve-out programs, Strategic Sourcing, Negotiations, Cost out programs, Benchmarking and Supplier expertise.

Our clients include Heineken, Royal Philips, Coty, Ahold Delhaize, Royal BAM, HEMA, Upfield, Wella, Stork, Swinkels, Signify, Adidas, Bugaboo, OLVG, Ordina, CRH, Flynth, Vodafone Ziggo and many more.

The team has over 15+ years of experience in IT Procurement working at companies like Philips, Burberry, JDE, Marks and Spencer, Rabobank, T-Mobile, Liberty Global, APL and ING, .

Furthermore we have led negotiations in procuring Enterprise Applications with the likes of Salesforce, Adobe, SAP, IBM, Microsoft etc. 

For more info, please visit our website at www.strivesource.com
